alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG OUTFLOW WINDS FROM THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PARTS OF NORTHEASTERN CIBOLA, CENTRAL VALENCIA, SOUTH CENTRAL SANDOVAL AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong outflow winds from thunderstorms, extending from 7 miles east of Cebolletita to 10 miles northwest of Los Lunas to 9 miles east of San Acacia. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, southwestern Rio Rancho, Valencia, Los Lunas, Belen, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms, Peralta, Rio Communities North and Paradise Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 131 and 161. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 187 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
